name: search-tailor
description: A browser extension for tailoring your search results.
author: Nick Brombal

scripts.watch:js: chokidar "src/scripts/*.js" -c "npm run build:js; if [[ '{path}' == 'src/scripts/addonData.js' ]]; then npm run build:html; fi;" --initial
scripts.reinstall: rimraf node_modules && npm cache verify && npm install

script-documentation.build:manifest: Directly copies the manifest file to the dist/ folder.
script-documentation.watch:manifest: Watches the manifest file, running build:manifest on change.
script-documentation.build:html: Compiles .pug files to .html files, passing src/scripts/addonData.js for template data.
script-documentation.watch:html: Watches .pug files, recompiling specific files on change.
script-documentation.watch:css: Watches .scss files, recompiling all such files on change.
script-documentation.lint:js: Lints all .js files without exiting, so as not to interrupt watching.
script-documentation.bundle:js:addon: Bundles the addon script and its requirements into a single dist/ file.
script-documentation.bundle:js:popup: Bundles the popup script and its requirements into a single dist/ file.
script-documentation.bundle:js:options: Bundles the options script and its requirements into a single dist/ file.
script-documentation.bundle:js: Performs all bundling tasks in parallel.
script-documentation.build:js: Lints and then bundles all .js files.
script-documentation.watch:js: Watches .js files, rebuilding all such files on change. Conditionally rebuilds .pug files if src/scripts/addonData.js changes.
script-documentation.build:assets: Directly copies all src assets to dist assets.
script-documentation.watch:assets: Watches assets, rebuilding all such files on change.
script-documentation.clean: Removes and recreates the dist folder and its subfolders.
script-documentation.build: Cleans and then builds all project files.
script-documentation.watch: Cleans and then builds all project files, and then initiates all watches parallel.
script-documentation.reinstall: Removes and reinstalls all npm dependencies.
